entries.title: Tesla Will Build Heavy Trucks at a New Factory in Nevada
entries.description: The $3.6 billion investment, which also includes a new battery factory, presents a challenge to traditional truck makers that have been slow to sell electric vehicles.

entries.title: Elon Musk Said Tesla Buyout Plan Didn’t Involve ‘a Specific Number’
entries.description: Under questioning, Mr. Musk said he hadn’t discussed how much money investors would put in to help him take his car company private.

entries.title: Microsoft Revenue Up 2 Percent, but Profit Drops 12 Percent
entries.description: The company, which announced plans to lay off 10,000 workers last week, had warned that is was facing a significant slowdown in the growth of its sales.

entries.title: The Unknown Hedge Fund That Got $400 Million From Sam Bankman-Fried
entries.description: After the collapse of FTX, prosecutors and lawyers have scrutinized its discredited founder’s huge investment in Modulo Capital.

entries.title: Emailing Your Doctor May Carry a Fee
entries.description: More hospitals and medical practices have begun charging for doctors’ responses to patient queries, depending on the level of medical advice.
